alert.note: Alert for Allen; Henry; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 4:02AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph. Winds will shift west-southwest at 20 to 30 mph with gusts in the 40 to 50 mph range later this afternoon. * WHERE...In Indiana, Wells, Adams, Grant, Blackford and Jay Counties. In Ohio, Henry, Putnam, Van Wert and Allen OH Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow is likely at times which may hamper travel especially over open and rural areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
